---
category: news
title: "When Do Babies Play Peekaboo?"
excerpt: "Is there a perfect peekaboo age? Not necessarily. Object recognition develops around month 3, and babies start to better understand the concept of object permanence by month 8. By months 9 to 12, your baby will likely be able to play peekaboo on her own."
